#!/bin/bash
yum update -y

# Harden bastion
echo "AllowUsers ec2-user" >> /etc/ssh/sshd_config
echo "PermitRootLogin no" >> /etc/ssh/sshd_config
systemctl restart sshd

# Install useful tools
yum install -y mysql
